- Location: Exterior first-floor window set in stucco wall.
- Window/Frame: White vinyl/aluminum double-hung sash with interior blinds.
- Sill/Trim: White painted concrete/masonry sill showing minor chipping at edges.
- Sealant: Exterior caulking around jambs appears aged; reseal to maintain moisture barrier.
- Surroundings: Electrical conduit along wall nearby; ensure proper weatherproofing and clearance. No visible glazing cracks or leaks in photo.
